levels.objective: Find nouns, pronouns, verbs and conjunctions.
Find determiners, nouns, pronouns, verbs, prepositions and conjunctions.
levels.goal: dtm nou prn vrb ppt cjt

determiners-nouns.sentence: Every evening I play with my friends.
determiners-nouns.answer: dtm   nou     prn vrb ppt dtm nou

determiners-nouns.sentence: The man carries a sack of wheat.
determiners-nouns.answer: dtm nou vrb     dtm nou ppt nou

determiners-nouns.sentence: The rain falls on the garden.
determiners-nouns.answer: dtm nou  vrb   ppt dtm nou

determiners-nouns.sentence: The boy and his friend leave the village.
determiners-nouns.answer: dtm nou cjt dtm nou    vrb   dtm nou

determiners-nouns.sentence: The tree is behind the wall.
determiners-nouns.answer: dtm nou  vrb ppt   dtm nou

determiners-nouns.sentence: A father waits for his son.
determiners-nouns.answer: dtm nou  vrb   ppt dtm nou

determiners-nouns.sentence: Some bread (is cooking) in the oven.
determiners-nouns.answer: dtm  nou   vrb    ppt dtm nou

pronouns-verbs.sentence: Between you and I, I think this is a great idea.
pronouns-verbs.answer: ppt     prn cjt prn prn vrb prn  vrb dtm adj nou

pronouns-verbs.sentence: If he has time, he (will come).
pronouns-verbs.answer: cjt prn vrb nou prn vrb

determiners-nouns-adjectives.sentence: They watch the beautiful moon from their house.
determiners-nouns-adjectives.answer: prn  vrb   dtm adj       nou  ppt  dtm   nou

determiners-nouns-adjectives.sentence: Her small garden is (close to) her house.
determiners-nouns-adjectives.answer: dtm adj   nou    vrb ppt       dtm nou

determiners-nouns-adjectives.sentence: The man tells a long story to his grandchildren.
determiners-nouns-adjectives.answer: dtm nou vrb   dtm adj nou  ppt dtm nou

determiners-nouns-adjectives.sentence: The man and his best friend leave the silent town.
determiners-nouns-adjectives.answer: dtm nou cjt dtm adj  nou    vrb   dtm adj    nou

determiners-nouns-adjectives.sentence: Yesterday, their great bookshop was closed.
determiners-nouns-adjectives.answer: adv        dtm   adj   nou      vrb adj

pronouns-verbs-prepositions.sentence: I had a party for my birthday.
pronouns-verbs-prepositions.answer: prn vrb dtm nou ppt dtm nou

pronouns-verbs-prepositions.sentence: The cat (is sitting) under the chair.
pronouns-verbs-prepositions.answer: dtm nou vrb          ppt   dtm nou

pronouns-verbs-prepositions.sentence: I asked my classmate for a pen.
pronouns-verbs-prepositions.answer: prn vrb dtm nou      ppt dtm nou

nouns-pronouns-verbs-conjunctions.sentence: Lucie is both nice and patient.
nouns-pronouns-verbs-conjunctions.answer: nou   vrb cjt adv  cjt adv

nouns-pronouns-verbs-conjunctions.sentence: I (will phone) or I (will write) to them.
nouns-pronouns-verbs-conjunctions.answer: prn vrb        cjt prn vrb  ppt prn

nouns-pronouns-verbs-conjunctions.sentence: I want a coffee and a biscuit.
nouns-pronouns-verbs-conjunctions.answer: prn vrb dtm nou cjt dtm nou

nouns-pronouns-verbs-conjunctions.sentence: He is very late, but he has an excuse.
nouns-pronouns-verbs-conjunctions.answer: prn vrb adv adj cjt prn vrb dtm nou

nouns-pronouns-verbs-conjunctions.sentence: The clouds are huge and dark.
nouns-pronouns-verbs-conjunctions.answer: dtm nou     vrb adj cjt adj

nouns-pronouns-verbs-conjunctions.sentence: The cat or the dog (has broken) this toy.
nouns-pronouns-verbs-conjunctions.answer: dtm nou cjt dtm nou vrb   dtm  nou

nouns-pronouns-verbs-conjunctions.sentence: I want (to go) although we are late.
nouns-pronouns-verbs-conjunctions.answer: prn vrb vrb cjt   prn vrb adj

nouns-pronouns-verbs-conjunctions.sentence: Unless he is away, you (can meet) him.
nouns-pronouns-verbs-conjunctions.answer: cjt    prn vrb adv prn vrb  prn

nouns-pronouns-verbs-conjunctions.sentence: If you like chocolate, you (will like) this.
nouns-pronouns-verbs-conjunctions.answer: cjt prn vrb nou        prn vrb    prn

nouns-pronouns-verbs-conjunctions.sentence: Since you are busy, I (will do) it.
nouns-pronouns-verbs-conjunctions.answer: cjt   prn vrb  adv  prn  vrb  prn

interjections.sentence: Hmm, I think it is true.
interjections.answer: itj  prn vrb prn vrb adj

interjections.sentence: Oh! The dog (has broken) this toy.
interjections.answer: itj dtm nou  vrb         dtm  nou

determiners-nouns-pronouns-verbs-preposi.sentence: Her beautiful garden is (close to) her new house.
determiners-nouns-pronouns-verbs-preposi.answer: dtm adj       nou    vrb ppt dtm adj nou

determiners-nouns-pronouns-verbs-preposi.sentence: The old man tells a true story to his grandchildren.
determiners-nouns-pronouns-verbs-preposi.answer: dtm adj nou vrb   dtm adj nou ppt dtm nou

determiners-nouns-pronouns-verbs-preposi.sentence: The young man drives slowly on the long road.
determiners-nouns-pronouns-verbs-preposi.answer: dtm adj   nou vrb    adv    ppt dtm adj nou

determiners-nouns-pronouns-verbs-preposi.sentence: The big man and his old friend leave the town.
determiners-nouns-pronouns-verbs-preposi.answer: dtm adj nou cjt dtm adj nou   vrb   dtm nou

determiners-nouns-pronouns-verbs-preposi.sentence: The long days of summer are warm.
determiners-nouns-pronouns-verbs-preposi.answer: dtm adj  nou  ppt nou   vrb adj
